bit_field.name: INIT
bit_field.description: Initial Value Of The FTM Counter

bit_field.name: REINIT
bit_field.description: FTM Counter Reinitialization By Synchronization (FTM counter synchronization)

bit_field.description: Dual Edge Capture Mode Enable For n = 0

bit_field.description: Dual Edge Capture Mode Captures For n = 0

bit_field.name: TOFDIR
bit_field.description: Timer Overflow Direction In Quadrature Decoder Mode

bit_field.name: QUADIR
bit_field.description: FTM Counter Direction In Quadrature Decoder Mode

bit_field.name: SWRSTCNT
bit_field.description: FTM counter synchronization is activated by the software trigger.

bit_field.name: SWWRBUF
bit_field.description: MOD, HCR, CNTIN, and CV registers synchronization is activated by the software trigger.

bit_field.name: SWOM
bit_field.description: Output mask synchronization is activated by the software trigger.

bit_field.name: SWINVC
bit_field.description: Inverting control synchronization is activated by the software trigger.

bit_field.name: SWSOC
bit_field.description: Software output control synchronization is activated by the software trigger.

bit_field.name: HWRSTCNT
bit_field.description: FTM counter synchronization is activated by a hardware trigger.

bit_field.name: HWWRBUF
bit_field.description: MOD, HCR, CNTIN, and CV registers synchronization is activated by a hardware trigger.

bit_field.name: HWOM
bit_field.description: Output mask synchronization is activated by a hardware trigger.

bit_field.name: HWINVC
bit_field.description: Inverting control synchronization is activated by a hardware trigger.

bit_field.name: HWSOC
bit_field.description: Software output control synchronization is activated by a hardware trigger.

bit_field.description: Mirror of the Modulo Integer Value
